name: com.awareframework.ios.sensor.gravity
summary: A Gravity Sensor Module for AWARE Framework.
description:
com.awareframework.ios.sensor.gravity (Gravity) provides device-motion data indicating key motion-related attributes such as the device's orientation relative to gravity.
This data is provided by Core Motionâ€™s sensor fusion algorithms.
